data.text: @pallabroynl @FinnairHelps Hi, nice that you are flying on such a special day! Some options to surprise her could be upgrading your tickets: https://t.co/0MZc5NB5M2, ordering something from our pre-order selection: https://t.co/JxT15rIiMi or buying a lounge access: https://t.co/UzI3bxjLBg. -Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Upgrade your travel class
urls.description: Make your Finnair flight even more pleasant with an upgrade to Business Class or our brand-new Premium Economy Class.

urls.title: Pre-order products
urls.description: Browse through some of our customer favorites and best-sellers available for purchase during your flight. Enlighten your holidays by pre-ordering trendy items from iconic sunglasses to refreshments. make the most out of your holidays! The delicious Fazer sweets and kids favorites are perfect to enjoy onboard, during the trip and as a souvenir. Long live design! Discover the best of iconic Finnish design with our hand-picked selection. Fill in your next flight details to add pre-order products to your

urls.title: Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Combining Nordic design, atmosphere and hospitality, our lounges at Helsinki Airport invite you to spend a hassle-free moment before your flight. There are three lounges at Helsinki Airport – Finnair Lounge in the Schengen side and Finnair Business Lounge and Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of the airport.

@AndrewMMacLeod Hi, I am sincerely extremely sorry for this inconvenience and long waiting times in our customer service channels at the moment! Please try again calling our customer service, you can find their phone number here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@JantjeH63 Hi, I am truly sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service currently! You can find all our phone numbers here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@raymond_hackett Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! Do you perhaps have a different payment method you could try? If you still unable to make the payment, please contact our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@emma_wiik Hi Emma! I am sorry to hear this. If you do not want to use our feedback form I can also forward your feedback to our CR team if you tell more as a DM. Please inform also your booking reference code and e-mail address. -Sara

data.text: Some flights to Asia are cancelled due to the Russian airspace closure, and frequencies in our European network are adjusted to the resulting decrease in transferring customers. If there are changes in your flights, we will contact you via email or SMS: https://t.co/XskPxH32eP

We have updated our traffic program for summer 2022 due to the closure of Russian airspace. We will connect customers from Helsinki hub to almost 70 European destinations, five North American destinations and eight Asian destinations. Read more: https://t.co/yVhMYtXKIE https://t.co/X2Bo0CETjq

data.text: @singh_irl I am very sorry for the long waiting time. At the moment the answering time is several weeks. We do our best to reply to all feedbacks and claims as soon as possible. -Sara
@sheborg Hi, I apologise for the inconvenience! I'm glad you got the flight booked. Have a lovely day! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@tjclccs_tauseef Hello! Apologies for delayed answer. I answered to your DM just couple of minutes ago! -Anu /Finnair
@LimbReaper Hi! I just answered to your DM! -Anu/Finnair

@anaustinmom 2/2 Or if the case is not urgent, please send us a DM with booking details and as a identification email address and names of the passengers. So let´s see if we can help you from here. -Anu / Finnair

@anaustinmom Hi! Apologies if reaching our customer care has been problematic. At this moment we have long queues in all our customer care channels and in urgent matters we advise to contact our customer care via phone or chat. 1/2

@gottosayit Hi! Apologies for the problems to reach our customer care. At this moment our customer care has long queues and in urgent matter we advise to contact by calling or via chat.. If the matter is not urgent then please send us a DM so let´s see if we can help from here? -Anu/Finnair
@Edmund_Michaels Hi, if you still need help with this, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates and e-mail address, and details of the problem and we can have a look. /Elli

@jasonpaltrow Hi Jason! Sorry to hear that reaching us has been problematic. Our customer care has long queues at this moment and in urgent cases we advise to contact either phone or chat. If your case is not urgent please send us a DM with the booking details and email + phone number. -Anu

@marshallmarcus Hi Marshall, I am sincerely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service channels! We are getting a very large amount of contacts at the moment. Are you perhaps able to find an answer from our FAQ section: https://t.co/DpukIZClDz? Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@ladylunascorpio Hi, I am sorry that the refund process takes a while at the moment! We will inform you via email when your refund application has been processed. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@RandyTa23532540 Hello Randy! At this moment our CR team is facing a backlog and has multiple cases on the queue. Could you send us private message (DM) with the case number that you got after filling the form and also as a identification of the booking code and also the email address? -Anu

@Charlie_CXCO Hi Charlie! Could you send us a private message with booking code, travel dates, phone number and email address, so let´s see if we can help you from here. If the travel date is within couple of days please contact our customer care by calling or via chat. -Anu

@singh_irl Hi! I am sorry to hear this. I can see that you have made a claim on our website. Please note that we cannot comment on claim issues here on social media. You will receive a notification to your e-mail when our CR team has responded to your claim. -Sara

@Ossluo Hei Ossi, olen todella pahoillani ruuhkista asiakaspalvelussamme! Jos et saanut vaihdettua lentoasi Varaukseni-palvelussa: https://t.co/9XxYJdob6d, yritäthän vielä uudelleen olla yhteydessä asiakaspalveluumme. Voit myös lähettää yksityisviestin @FinnairHelps-tilille. -Ada/Finnair

data.text: Lapland is magical all year around, and during the springtime, you can enjoy glittering snow blankets in the spring sun. Days are getting warmer and longer, but there is still plenty of snow to enjoy. What's your favourite destination in Northern Finland? https://t.co/Q1mZmI21Si https://t.co/4NSbkHqBb2

urls.title: Nature experiences, well-being, and snow adventures in Lapland
urls.description: Lapland is at its best in the spring side of winter. There is no lack of snowy slopes, and the days are growing longer and sunnier. The different resorts offer plenty to choose from, whether you are a keen sportsperson, looking for local flavours, wanting to try out new activities or just need to rewind in nature. Ivalo is the travel center of Northern Lapland; it has the most nort hern airport in the EU as well as great services such as hotels and restaurants. Ivalo is known for its truly unique nature

data.text: @peterhick Hi Peter, I sincerely apologise for the inconvenience! We've been training new employees for our customer service, but unfortunately the throughout training takes a long time and the current situation in the world is causing more and more contacts there. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@RatGrunge Hi, could you please check this with our customer service? You can use the chatbot on our website or find their contact information here: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Estef333 Hi, I am sincerely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service currently! If you aren't able to change the travel dates in: https://t.co/GlMBvsVJnA, could you please try reaching our customer service once more? Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @lalafinland Hi, on no - I am so sorry about this! Could you please DM us your name and address and I will try to send you one? 💙 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@BoyBattersea Hi, due to the current situation and additional flight cancellations, we have had to postpone the opening of it. We hope to be able to open it soon, but I don't, unfortunately, have a set date yet. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@MrLKSswe We are hoping to go back flying our normal short and fast route to Asia, but if we will still need to use the polar route during the summer, then yes. It's impossible to say yet. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@serivore1 Hi Emilie, we will proceed with the refunds as soon as we can. I apologise for the inconvenience and the wait! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@PaiviTen Luckily, our LHR-HEL flights can still take their normal route. :) -Ada/Finnair
@S_ilmailumuseo Love it, thank you for sharing, @S_ilmailumuseo! 💙

@MVLibertas Hi Mat, it depends on the winds, whether we will take the northern or southern detour. Crossing the North Pole is likely on our Tokyo Narita flights and possible also on the return flight from Seoul to Helsinki. You can read more here: https://t.co/HdaFALZ1jA. -Ada/Finnair

@peterhick Hi! Apologies for the problems to reach our customer care.  our customer service is currently congested, in urgent cases we advise to try via chat or phone. If the matter is not urgent please send us DM which includes the booking code, route, passenger name and email -Anu/Finnair

@andrikos 2/2 We of course hope that the code is not misused by those for whom it is not intended. As the code is valid only for certain one-way routes, the chances of it being misused are limited. -Anu / Finnair

@andrikos Hi! The code is intended to be used by Ukranians who are fleeing the war. We do not ask for proof of citizenship when purchasing the tickets, as implementing that into the system would have been time-consuming and help needs to be available now when people need it. 1/2

Since Russia closed its airspace on 28 February, we have had to find alternative routes for our Asian flights. If your flight is operated over the North Pole, we will reward you with a Northern route diploma, which was also handed out back in the 1980s. https://t.co/wtve1YU4LI https://t.co/Mb9mC8Dtzn

urls.title: Flying over the North Pole: Well-planned is half done
urls.description: On 9 March 2022, flight AY073 from Helsinki to Tokyo Narita departed at 17:30 local time. However, instead of heading east, the flight headed towards the North Pole. With this flight, Finnair resumed its service to Tokyo Narita, skirting around Russian airspace that closed on 28 February. Back in 1983, Finnair was the first airline to fly non-stop from Europe to Japan, flying over the North Pole – so operating in the polar region is not new to Finnair. But after a break of almost 30 years, there were a

data.text: @ZyiawithFelica Hi! Could you send us DM ( private message) hat includes the booking code, passenger name(s), route and email address  so let´s see the situation and we can help you form here or not. We don´t handle the bookings in tweets due the passenger privacy. -Anu / Finnair

data.text: @HelenBeedham 2/ if the matter is not urgent and the flight departure is not within couple of weeks, you can send us a DM (private message) which has booking code, route, names of the passenger(s) and email address. So we can check if we can help you from here. -Anu / Finnair

@HelenBeedham Unfortunately we have long queues in all of our contact channels and we want to prioritize the customer care via phone and chat at this moment, which shows as long queues.. Due this in urgent matters we advise to contact our customer care via phone or chat. 1/2

@JohnMorris1982 Hi. Apologies if reaching our customer care has been problematic. At this moment there is long queues in all of our channels. If the matter is urgent then try to reach us by calling or via chat. If it is no n-urgent please send us a DM with booking code, route and email. -Anu

Helsinki Airport is going through a total transformation to offer you a seamless journey. We are gradually moving Finnair departure hall services to the new premises by mid-April, starting from next week already. Read more: https://t.co/pbtG4v5GH3

urls.title: Smooth travelling at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Flying via Helsinki means that you can enjoy the compact and uncrowded Helsinki Airport, where all the gates and services are located under one roof, in one terminal building. Helsinki Airport welcomes you with its new spacious arrival and departure halls! As the main transit area for Finnair customers, the brand-new terminal will make connections extra quick and smooth. Catching a train, bus or taxi to or from the airport is now easier than ever as everything is nearby the terminal entrance. The

data.text: @oztiks @FinnairHelps Hi, you can find our up-to-date customer service phone numbers on our website: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@RC_Panda121 Hi Randy, I am truly very sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service at the moment. Due to the unexceptional situation, we are getting a very large amount of contacts. Please try again reaching customer service. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Join our journey towards carbon neutrality – you can now calculate and offset the carbon footprint from your flights with our service that combines Sustainable Aviation Fuel and trusted climate projects. Read more: https://t.co/hFMR40evx1 https://t.co/QOUClScH07

urls.title: Finnair's carbon offset service
urls.description: Join us on our most important journey and offset your flight emissions.

data.text: @arunvrtvm Please contact our customer service. There is no separate or specific phone number for group bookings. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@mikk0j @YazSec @FinnairHelps Hi, I am sincerely sorry for the congestion in our customer service at the moment. We are getting a large amount of contacts due to the current situation. Our English customer service is open 24h, although the waiting times might be unfortunately long. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
